qa_pair.question: Find all Autonomous Databases that are currently in AVAILABLE state with auto-scaling enabled. How many such databases exist across all compartments?

Find the Autonomous Database with the largest data storage size. What is the storage size in TB?
List all stopped Autonomous Databases. What is the total OCPU count that would be consumed if all of them were started?
Find all DB Systems running Oracle Database 19c. How many instances are configured with high availability (multiple nodes)?
Identify the Autonomous Database that was created most recently. What month and year was it created? Use format YYYY-MM.
Calculate the total estimated monthly cost for all running Autonomous Databases based on their OCPU count. Round to nearest hundred dollars.
Find databases that have automatic backup enabled but haven't had a successful backup in the last 24 hours. How many such databases exist?
Among all MySQL Database Systems, which one has the most read replicas configured? Provide the count of replicas.
Find the Autonomous Data Warehouse (ADW) with the highest number of concurrent connections in the last hour. What is the peak connection count?
